title: Samsung Galaxy Buds Pro get new ‘TrueGrip’ foam eartips from Comply
content:
Most wireless earbuds come with standard earbud tips. Those soft, silicone tips don’t do too much for sound or comfort and Comply knows this. That being the case, the company is launching new Comply foam earbud tips for the Samsung Galaxy Buds Pro.

more…

The post Samsung Galaxy Buds Pro get new ‘TrueGrip’ foam eartips from Comply appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Comply has released new TrueGrip memory-foam earbud tips for the Galaxy Buds Pro, to improve both sound and comfort.
